trans-unit.source: Contains information needed to perform schema importation using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> and <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter"></xref> infrastructure.
The XmlSerializerImportOptions is used by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerMessageContractImporter>.
It is also used with the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) with the `/useXmlSerializer` (`/uxs)` switch.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.XmlSerializerImportOptions"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.XmlSerializerImportOptions"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref>.
An object that provides a container for the <xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref> program graph.
Gets or sets the ClrNamespace property that contains the types being mapped to the XML namespace.
An object that contains types being mapped.
Gets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> object that provides a container for the <xref href="System.CodeDom"></xref> program graph.
An object that provides a container for a program graph.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> object that checks whether particular options for a target language are supported.
An object that checks target language options.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> object that contains the code generation options specified in the XML text file.
An object containing code generation options.
